name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fontswap - Change the font of any website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the font of any website to your favorite Google Font

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fontswap is a powerful Chrome extension that lets you personalize the fonts on any website with your favorite Google Fonts. Enhance your reading experience with just a few clicks!

Features:
1. Wide Selection of Google Fonts: Choose from a vast library of fonts.
2. One-Click Application: Easily apply your chosen font to any website.
3. Reset to Default: Quickly revert to the original font.
4. Persistent Preferences: Fontswap remembers your font choices for each website.
5. Lightweight & Fast: Optimized for performance and speed.
